name: fly bird (itch)
description: The player will take control of the bird. And plunge into all the difficulties of flying for a bird. The game requires constant attention. For the distance traveled you get points. These points will be recorded in the rating table. You have to be a real master to skillfully fly around obstacles. Management is very simple. If you clicked on the screen, the bird flies up, if you press the screen, the bird will fly down.
